title: desktop app converter keeps running state on build 14342
body: I run the converter on powershell, but it can not finish the work though it doesn't report any problems. In other works, it keeps running state, here is the complete log:

comments.body: I found the reason, it is because the test.exe doesn't support slient installing.

What is you 'Test.exe' supposed to to?
This log looks like the Exe didn't exit (yet)
You can check using Taskmanager, if the Test.exe-Process is still listed.
If you add the 'image path name' in the collumns, then your process should display ' C:\DesktopAppConverter\5f41c777-1cae-4bed-b4c9-5bafaaac4175\shared\Test.exe' according to the log above.
